
{{alias}}( x )
    Computes the hyperbolic arccosecant of a number.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    y: number
        Hyperbolic arccosecant.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 0.0 )
    Infinity
    > y = {{alias}}( -1.0 )
    ~-0.881
    > y = {{alias}}( NaN )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
